data.comment: Today's referee, Lawrence Visser, has blown to start the match.
Goal! Adrien Trebel gives Anderlecht a 0-1 lead in Beveren.
In the minute 3, That's a fine assist from Jeremy Doku.
Lukas Nmecha is booked for the away team.
Anderlecht take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Jeremy Doku.
In the minute 45, Anderlecht have been given a penalty at Freethielstadion...
Lawrence Visser awards Anderlecht a penalty but Lukas Nmecha misses from 12 yards.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Amine Khammas (Waasland-Beveren) has received a yellow card from Lawrence Visser.
The second-half is underway in Beveren.
Din Sula is replacing Alessandro Albanese for the home team.
In the minute 55, Yari Verschaeren puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-3.
Jeremy Doku instrumental with a fine assist.
At Freethielstadion, Leonardo Bertone has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 59, Anderlecht have been given a penalty...
Nordin Jackers for Waasland-Beveren has been booked by Lawrence Visser and receives a first yellow card.
Goal! The away team extend their lead to 0-4 thanks to a penalty from Lukas Nmecha.
In the minute 64, Goal! Din Sula pulls one back for Waasland-Beveren to make it 1-4.
Great play from Joe Efford to set up the goal.
The away team have replaced Adrien Trebel with Mustapha Bundu. This is the first substitution made today by Vincent Kompany.
In the minute 65, Dries Wuytens is replacing Djihad Bizimana for Waasland-Beveren at Freethielstadion.
Dries Wuytens (Waasland-Beveren) gets a yellow card.
Matthias Verreth is on a sub for Leonardo Bertone for Waasland-Beveren.
In the minute 78, Vincent Kompany is making the team's second substitution at Freethielstadion with Nany Dimata replacing Lukas Nmecha.
Anderlecht make their third substitution with Francis Amuzu replacing Jeremy Doku.
Daan Heymans keeps the home team in the match by reducing the deficit to 2-4.
Lawrence Visser blows to end the match. The final score is 2-4.
